# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 5.0.x   | :white_check_mark: |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

If you discover a security vulnerability, please send an email to mohammed.bencheikh.dev@gmail.com.
Do not create a GitHub issue for security vulnerabilities.

## Dependabot Configuration

This project uses Dependabot to keep dependencies up to date. Pull requests for security updates are automatically created.

## Security Measures

- Weekly dependency updates
- Automated security audits
- Dependency version pinning
- Continuous vulnerability scanning
